context.title: Story 3.3: Automated Quiz Question Generation
context.description: As a user, I want the system to automatically generate quiz questions (e.g., multiple choice, true/false) from my study materials, So that I can assess my understanding.

criterion.given: an uploaded study material (text) and a request for quiz generation
criterion.then: it generates a set of diverse quiz questions based on the content.

criterion.when: it generates a set of diverse quiz questions based on the content
criterion.then: the questions include correct answers and plausible distractors (for multiple choice).

criterion.when: it generates a set of diverse quiz questions based on the content
criterion.then: the quiz is presented in an interactive format.

technical_notes.note: Covers FR7. Similar to flashcard generation, but with a focus on creating assessment-style questions.
